attributes.action: Trial the use of cash point / ATM machines to process votes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Using current Cashpoints (ATM) to process voting information as an additional service.

Key points:

- Use of existing infrastructure with software enhancements for an additional service

- Public perceived security and actual security

- Foresee voting card, voting PIN and paper receipt of voting transaction.

- Established in liaison with banking network to share costs - perhaps per transaction charge back by the banks to central / local gov to keep upfront costs low.
